articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun on Occasion of Day of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun on Occasion of Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00, Tuesday, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Kim Tong Hwa and other commanding officers of the armed forces organ.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid before them was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 He entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Il Sung in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					 He went round the hall in which the orders Kim Il Sung received are on display.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence for him.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Directors of International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, International Kim Jong Il Prize Council
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Directors of International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, International Kim Jong Il Prize Council
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a friendly talk with directors of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday. 
					 They were Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the International Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, Henry Masiko, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and Alexandr Prokhanov, editor-in-chief of the Russian paper Zavtra.

articles.title: Condolences to Nicaraguan President
articles.content:
Condolences to Nicaraguan President
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Monday sent a message of sympathy to Daniel Ortega Saavedra, president of Nicaragua, as regards an earthquake that hit Nicaragua, claiming human casualties and material losses.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the Nicaraguan president and, through him, to the Nicaraguan government and people and the bereaved families of the victims.
					
					 It hoped that the Nicaraguan government would eradicate the aftermath of the natural disaster and stabilize the people's livelihood in the afflicted area as early as possible under the leadership of the president.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The message said that the President's birth as the sun of Juche Korea in Pyongyang, holy city of the Korean nation, on April 15, Juche 1 (1912) was a great fortune of the nation which upheld the prominent leader for the first time in the five thousand year-long history of the nation and a great event in which the dawn broke in the era of independence.
					
					 It noted that the more than 80 year-long life of the President is the one of the peerlessly great man who glorified the 20th century as the one of the victory of the cause of independence against imperialism and the socialist cause with his outstanding idea, extraordinary leadership and noble virtues, enjoying absolute support and trust from the people. It went on:
					
					 The idea and cause of the President could greet the heyday under the outstanding and seasoned leadership of General Kim Jong Il, a great man of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il will be everlasting together with the national history.
					
					 The message noted that the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun pioneered and glorified by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is being deeply revered by the Koreans as another peerless patriot and peerlessly great man.
					
					 The vanguard fighters and patriotic people from all walks of life in the south are firmly determined to certainly achieve national reunification, the lifelong desire of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un, the message concluded.

articles.title: Cambodian King and Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King and Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- King Norodom Sihamoni and great queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk of Cambodia sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Upon the authorization of the king and great queen, the delegation of the Cambodian Ministry of Royal Palace headed by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace paid a congratulatory visit to the DPRK embassy on April 7 and laid floral baskets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The king and the great queen prayed that Kim Il Sung will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people, the deputy prime minister said, adding:
					
					 I wish HE Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the party, state and army of the DPRK, good health and greater successes in accomplishing the cause for the building of a thriving nation and the Korean people happiness.
					
					 I also wish the bonds of friendship between Cambodia and the DPRK everlasting.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National Chairman, International Secretary of C.C., Brazilian Communist Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National Chairman, International Secretary of C.C., Brazilian Communist Party
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greetings from National Chairman Renato Ravello and international secretary Ricardo Alemao Abreu of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party on April 10.
					 The message said:
					
					 The Brazilian Communist Party extends congratulations to you and the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people on the occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The WPK is successfully leading the drive of the Korean people to defend the independence and sovereignty of the country and build socialism.
					
					 Recollecting the heroic struggle of the WPK led by Comrade Kim Il Sung, we reaffirm the fraternal friendship between the Brazilian Communist Party and the Workers' Party of Korea and between the Brazilian and Korean peoples.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegations, Delegate of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegations, Delegate of Juche Idea Study Organizations 
						
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from the chairman of the South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, a delegation  of the Study Forum for SelfÔºçReliance of Nepal and an Italian delegation for the study of the Juche idea on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The gifs were conveyed to an official concerned on Monday.
					
					 Meanwhile, gifts were sent to Kim Jong Un by the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand and the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association on the same day.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Kazakh President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Kazakh President
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Kazakh President Nursultan Nazarbayev on Tuesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend sincere congratulations to you on my own behalf and on behalf of the Kazakh people on the occasion of Day of the Sun, the national holiday of the DPRK.
					
					 Your Excellency,
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I wish you and your family members good health and success in the work and the friendly Korean people happiness and prosperity.
					
					 Please accept my respect to you.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greetings from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on April 8.
					 The message said:
					
					 I deem it an honor to extend highest tribute to Comrade Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK on behalf of all the members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung is the great revolutionary, benevolent father of the Korean people and outstanding elder statesman of the world who founded the WPK and the DPRK, led them to victory and built a socialist power in Korea and made distinguished feats in accomplishing the cause of the independent reunification of Korea and the world socialist cause.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I express belief that the WPK and the Korean people would frustrate all moves of the imperialists against the DPRK and achieve peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula under your wise leadership and most wholeheartedly wish you steady successes in your noble work to victoriously lead the WPK and the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Pakistani President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Pakistani President
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mamnoon Hussain, president of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, on April 11.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am pleased to extend our heartfelt warm greetings to Your Excellency and the people of the DPRK on the happy occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 I am convinced that the friendship and mutual cooperation between our two countries will grow stronger.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I most sincerely wish Your Excellency good health and happiness and the people of the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulatory Messages to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Organizations
articles.content:
Congratulatory Messages to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages from organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Union of Korean Central Educational Association in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, Standing Council of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, Central Standing Council of the Korean Human Rights Federation i
					
					 n Japan and other organizations of Chongryon and its affiliated organizations, Choson Sinbo Company, Korean  News Service, Hagu Bookshop, Kumgang-san Opera Troupe, Tonghae Co. Ltd., Korean Goods Sales Company, Kumgang Insurance Company, Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan, Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan, Korean Press Hall and other enterprises, local headquarters of Chongryon, Korean University and Korean schools in Japan at all levels.
					
					 The messages extended highest tribute to Kim Il Sung, the eternal sun of the nation and the benevolent father of Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan, in humblest reverence for him on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (his birth anniversary) and the highest glory to Kim Jong Un who is ushering in a great prosperity in the homeland, true to the idea and cause of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The homeland is dynamically advancing along the road of prosperity because Kim Il Sung laid all foundations in his lifetime, they noted.
					
					 It is our steadfast faith that we will certainly win victory in the confrontation with the Japanese reactionaries in any adversity as we are led by Kim Jong Un, they said.
					
					 They stressed that all officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will keep pace with the people in the homeland who are raising a strong wind of making a fresh leap forward on all fronts for the building of a thriving nation under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday, the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 They included diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here, delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea and other foreign guests, members of the delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun and other overseas Koreans.
					
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls where the Generalissimos lie in state they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches they used during field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 Meanwhile, the chief and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the same day and paid tribute to the Generalissimos.

articles.title: Reception Given for Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Reception Given for Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A reception for overseas Koreans was given at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were the delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China, the delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. and other overseas Koreans delegations and other overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 Present there were Kim Jin Guk, director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for National Reunification Praised by Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for National Reunification Praised by Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), was interviewed by KCNA on Monday.
					 Expressing his profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung, he said:
					
					 To hold President Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the sun of the nation is the greatest fortune of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The people in the south are paying highest tribute to him, recollecting his brilliant revolutionary career.
					
					 His 80 odd year-long life was the great one recorded with his outstanding idea, extraordinary leadership and noble virtues.
					
					 His intention was to make the whole nation live in a reunified prosperous country.
					
					 The historic Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea  was held in Pyongyang in April 1948 and the July 4 joint statement was adopted to provide the fundamental principles of reunification thanks to his will for reunification.
					
					 In order to put an end to the tragedy of national division, he examined a document on national reunification and left his historic autography, sitting up all night during the last period of his life.
					
					 The feats performed by the President, a peerless patriot and legendary hero, for national reunification will shine long in the national history.
					
					 Loud voices praising the undying feats performed by him on behalf the country and nation are heard from across south Korea on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.
					
					 The whole land of the south is pervaded with deep reverence for him as evidenced by the fact that progressive media in the south are giving wide publicity to his revolutionary life and undying feats.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is steering the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF and the people in the south will certainly bring earlier the day of reunification, holding him in high esteem as the lodestar of national reunification.

articles.title: Revolutionary Idea of Kim Il Sung Is Banner of Eternal Victory of Paektusan Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Revolutionary Idea of Kim Il Sung Is Banner of Eternal Victory of Paektusan Nation: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was the great sage of the revolution who fathered the immortal Juche idea and successfully embodied it  to the revolutionary practices, performing great exploits on behalf of the country and nation, era and history, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens and fathered the immortal Juche idea with his deep insight into the requirements of the era and developing history and future of the nation. 
					
					 The revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung is the idea centered on the popular masses which helped the DPRK develop into a genuine country for the people where their dreams and ideals come true. It is the revolutionary theory of independence which helped the DPRK develop into an invincible fortress dynamically advancing along the path chosen by itself. It serves as an all-powerful treasured sword which helped the DPRK turn into a country of miracles, heroic Korea making a leaping forward through gigantic creation and epoch-making changes. 
					
					 The immutable truth and might of changes provided by the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung were fully demonstrated by leader Kim Jong Il for several decades. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as Kimilsungism and declared the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea and developed the President's idea of attaching importance to arms into the Songun revolutionary idea, Songun political theory. 
					
					 Now Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is shedding more brilliant rays as the great guiding idea representing the present times and future of mankind under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The editorial calls for upholding the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as an invincible banner and dynamically ushering in a new era of prosperity of Songun Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Meanwhile, Minju Joson in an editorial calls upon all the people to uphold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and usher in the era of prosperity of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The letter said that April 15, Juche 1 (1912) is the day of the great fortune of the Korean nation when the dawn of Juche broke in the country overcast with dark clouds.
					
					 As led by Kim Il Sung, Korea once eclipsed on the world map put an end to the history of distress, the DPRK emerged a full-fledged political and military power and the Korean people could demonstrate the dignity as the independent people no one could provoke, it noted.
					
					 It praised him as the benefactor of rebirth as he brought a joy of liberation to the Koreans in Japan who shed bitter tears as a stateless nation in an alien land and put forward them as full-fledged overseas citizens of the independent and sovereign state shining with the august name of the sun.
					
					 It said that leader Kim Jong Il showed deep trust and loving care for protecting and developing Chongryon till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The Juche cause started and glorified by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being carried forward without an inch of deflection and is dynamically advancing toward the final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the letter said.
					
					 All the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will strengthen Chongryon formed by Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il into the overseas citizens organization of Juche Korea, remaining loyal to Kim Jong Un, and give fuller play to the honor as a model of the world movement of overseas compatriots, it concluded.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed to Celebrate Birthday of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed to Celebrate Birthday of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung here on Tuesday. 
					 A great number of people from all walks of life, youth and students were crowded in the areas along the Taedong River where the Tower of the Juche Idea stands and other parts of the capital city of Pyongyang including Kim Il Sung Square, Mansu Hill and Okryu Bridge to see the fireworks. Among them were overseas Koreans and foreign guests. 
					
					 At 20:00 fireworks with beautiful colors were displayed in the sky amid the solemn playing of the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung". 
					
					 Fireworks made beautiful scenery to celebrate the day of great fortune of the sun's nation, the great auspicious day.
					
					 People burst into cheers, seeing fireworks displayed amid the melodies of songs "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun" and "Song of Mangyongdae". 
					
					 The fireworks made the Tower of the Juche Idea bright, reflecting the might of the DPRK dignified in independence and prosperous in self-supporting and strong in self-defence and the epochal reality, the great fruition of the Juche idea fathered by Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Meanwhile, waterworks on the Taedong River added to the festive mood.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit 16th Kimilsungia Festival Hall
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit 16th Kimilsungia Festival Hall
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreigners visited the 16th Kimilsungia Festival hall Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included diplomatic envoys of various countries, military attaches' corps, economic and commercial councilors' corps and officials of foreign embassies here, the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross.
					
					 Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, said:
					
					 Whenever I visit the festival hall every year, I feel the profound reverence of the people for President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He is deeply revered not only by the Korean people but by the world people for his great exploits and noble virtues.
					
					 The guests made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy here who is doyen of the Military Attaches' Corps wrote that the flowers presented by people and soldiers of the DPRK and the world people clearly reflect their reverence for the President. He wished Marshal Kim Jong Un good health and bigger success in his responsible work.
					
					 Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, wrote that he sincerely congratulates the Korean people on the auspicious Day of the Sun and firmly believes that all desires of the President would come true under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Juche Idea Seminar on "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and Cause of Global Independence" Held
articles.content:
Juche Idea Seminar on "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and Cause of Global Independence" Held
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A Juche idea seminar on "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the cause of global independence" was held Monday at the People's Palace of Culture on the occasion of the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea, Juche idea followers, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, Ri Kil Song and Ji Sung Chol, vice-chairmen of the society, and officials concerned.
					
					 An opening address by Kenichi Ogami was followed by a congratulatory speech by Ji Sung Chol.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, vice director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that to successfully realize the ideal of the popular masses for independence and make them the master of the world and their destiny is the general target and noble ideal of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 He expressed belief that when taking the road indicated by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the great guiding idea for accomplishing the cause of global independence at the present times, the desire of mankind for freedom, peace and prosperity will be certainly realized.
					
					 He called for waging a dynamic struggle to bring earlier the victory of the cause of global independence under the unfurled banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Then followed speeches titled "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung who made theoretical and practical contributions to the cause of the world revolution and Juche idea", "Songun politics rooted on Juche idea and importance of Songun politics in cause of global independence and its reform", "Songun politics is model in defending interests of country and nation", "After studying First Secretary Kim Jong Un's speech 'Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive' (Feb. 25, 2014)", "Mutual Relations between the Society and Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism", "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is human cause of independence" and "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the great idea in era of independence".
					
					 Speakers said that the truth of the immortal Juche idea was proved historically and in practices thanks to the wise and devoted activities of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Juche Idea Seminar
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Juche Idea Seminar 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the Juche idea seminar on "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the cause of global independence" on Monday. 
					 The letter said that Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and declared it as the revolutionary idea representing the era. 
					
					 Now groups for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism are formed one after another in foreign countries and many people study hard Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 Each country and nation is now struggling against the domination and oppression by the reactionary forces including the U.S. imperialism and advancing along the path of victory, holding aloft the banner of independence.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the banner of the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle as he is dealing final blows at the imperialists going to ruin and a model of the world people who are fighting for the dignity of their countries and nations. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il indicated the Juche-oriented path of socialism and their noble intentions are being carried forward by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The Juche idea followers are conducting positive activities to study and disseminate the Juche idea including the publication of "Works of Kim Jong Un" in an effort to voice firm solidarity with the Korean people and widely inform the world people of the greatness of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The letter noted that the participants once again deeply grasped the justice of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and renewed their resolution to devote all to the struggle for achieving the independence of their own peoples and world people.

articles.title: Banquet Given in Celebration of Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Banquet Given in Celebration of Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to celebrate the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam and other senior officials of the party, state and army, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, meritorious persons, heads of overseas Korean delegations and other compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were couples of foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies here and military attaches and other foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a speech. 
					
					 The whole life of Kim Il Sung was the revolutionary life of the prominent leader and peerless elder statesman who performed undying exploits on behalf of the country and its people, the era and revolution with his profound idea and theory, distinguished leadership ability and great revolutionary practices, the speaker said. 
					
					 He extended the highest tribute and eternal glory to the President and Kim Jong Il, reflecting the unanimous desire of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK and world progressives.
					
					 He stressed the need to deeply cherish the images of smiling President and Kim Jong Il and successfully carry forward and develop their idea, cause and immortal exploits and thus creditably perform the duties as descendants of Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He called for thoroughly establishing the Party's monolithic leadership system in all fields of the revolution and construction and stressed the need for all the service personnel and people to closely unite around Kim Jong Un and carry on the march which started in Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 He clarified the DPRK's stand to dynamically hasten the historical cause of national reunification and make positive efforts to achieve world peace and security and common prosperity of mankind true to the behests of the President and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Organizations of China, Indonesia
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Organizations of China, Indonesia
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the Liaoning Provincial Association for International Friendly Contact and the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The floral baskets were conveyed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Assistant to the president of the Liaoning Provincial Association for International Friendly Contact Zhang Guixin who is heading the delegation of the association and Teguh Santosa, secretary general of the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Party Leader of DR Congo
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Party Leader of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Marie-Madeleine Mienze, deputy secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					 The floral basket was laid before the statues on Tuesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of DR Congo, on April 11.
					 The message said:
					
					 I deem it an honor to extend best wishes to you on behalf of all people of DR Congo and on my own behalf as regards your reelection to the top post of the state.
					
					 Availing myself of this auspicious opportunity, I reaffirm you my will to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations of mutual benefit for the happiness of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Please accept my highest respects to HE First Chairman.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from the general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea on April 11.
					 The message said:
					
					 At this time for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, on April 15, 2014, their greatest national holiday, all members and supporters of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea are pleased to extend our warmest congratulations to Your Excellency and, through you, to the Workers' Party of Korea and all the Korean people as ever on the occasion of this day of history when the great leader of the Korean people was born in the name of President Obiang, the founder and chairman of the party.
					
					 We wholeheartedly wish Your Excellency good health and grand celebration of this day.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun), and paid high tribute to Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen standing before the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the statues of the Generalissimos.
					
					 They entered the halls of immortality where the Generalissimos lie in state and made a bow to them in humble reverence.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the Generalissimos received from the Korean people and the world progressive people are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Goes On
articles.content:
29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Goes On
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival is going on before full houses in the DPRK.
					 Performances were given at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, Pyongyang Grand Theatre, Moranbong Theatre, Ponghwa Art Theatre, Central Youth Hall, Concert Hall of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory and the Pyongyang Circus Theater on Monday.
					
					 Foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes put on the stages colorful numbers including songs, instrumental music, dances and acrobatics, reflecting boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who are highly praised as peerlessly great men and world's elder statesmen by the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 The Chinese art troupe (Eastern Song and Dance Ensemble) put on the stage colorful numbers reflecting the patriotism of the Chinese people and traditional custom of various nations.
					
					 Artistes of the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Mongolian Army successfully represented Korean songs including a song created by them in reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Female soloists of the art troupe of the National Song and Dance Theatre of Vietnam and the Varna Opera Theatre of Bulgaria sang Korean song "Attraction and Reverence" and "Ode to Comrade Kim Jong Il", mesmerizing the audience.
					
					 The Vienna Wind Instrumental Group of Austria successfully presented instrumental music pieces, impressing the audience.
					
					 Members of the all-star delegation of Chopin Music University of Poland, the Dwiki-Music Group of Indonesia and the dance troupe of Kiev Dance Theater of Ukraine fully displayed their artistic talents in their programs.
					
					 The art troupe of Koreans in the U.S. and a Korean soloist in Australia were acclaimed by the audience for their high artistry and perfect ensemble. 
					
					 Acrobatic pieces presented by acrobats from Russia, China, Egypt and Thailand were also acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Meanwhile, the art troupe of Koreans in Japan and the art troupe of Koreans in China gave separate performances on the same day. 
					
					 Performances go on.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the DPRK Tuesday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Dancing parties began at venues in Pyongyang including the plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the plaza of the Arch of Triumph to the tune of song "Day of Sun, Spring Holiday."
					
					 When the band played such songs as "Mine Is Always the Country of Kim Il Sung" and "Song of Mangyongdae," youth and students enthusiastically danced, looking back on the exploits performed by the President. They presented dances to the tune of such song as "Our Comrade Kim Jong Il", missing leader Kim Jong Il very much.
					
					 They also danced to the tune of such songs as "Our Leader Loved by People" and "His Embrace Is the Best." They expressed ardent reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un who is glorifying the new history of attaching importance to the youth.
					
					 The festive mood revved up when the band played song like "Youth, Forward Following Party".
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: First Term of Children Camping Starts
articles.content:
First Term of Children Camping Starts
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The first term of camping began at schoolchildren's camps in Pyongyang and in other parts of the country on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A meeting for the opening of the camping took place at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Camp on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Jin Ha, secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of party and power organs and youth league in Pyongyang, teachers and employees of camps and campers.
					
					 As a bugle declaring the start of camping was sounded, a flag of camping was hoisted amid the playing of song "March of Children's Union".
					
					 The campers made a salute toward the flag.
					
					 A report and speeches were made at the meeting. Then followed a march-past of the campers.
					
					 Meetings for opening camping also took place at the Sokam Schoolchildren's Camp and all other camps across the country.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials including Kim Yong Nam and Pak Pong Ju, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions Tuesday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of his 102nd birth anniversary.  
					 They went round historic data and relics at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, recollecting the feats of Kim Il Sung who devoted his whole life to the liberation of Korea and its prosperity and the accomplishment of the cause of the people for independence and the noble life of his patriotic and revolutionary families members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 Entering the court of the old home in Mangyongdae where he was born and spent his childhood, they went round historic relics preserved at the straw thatched house.
					
					 They had a picture taken as a token of their visit to the old home.

articles.title: Participants in Kimilsungia Festival Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Kimilsungia Festival Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas Koreans participating in the 16th Kimilsungia Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They went round historic relics preserved with much care at the old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the revolutionary life of Kim Il Sung and his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of the President. 
					 Seen standing there was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, organs and enterprises at all levels, factories, farms and schools in Pyongyang and  bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Floral baskets and flowers were also placed before the statues and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang. 
					
					 Service personnel, people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their residential areas to pay high tribute to them.
					
					 Meanwhile, staff members of the Chinese and Russian consulates general in Chongjin visited the statue of Kim Il Sung in Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province to lay floral baskets and bouquets and pay tribute to him.
					
					 On the same day, Chinese residents in Chongjin and foreign guests staying in the city laid floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the statue of Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Cyprus Musical Company Enjoying Popularity in DPRK
articles.content:
Cyprus Musical Company Enjoying Popularity in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival is now going on here before full houses. Among musical companies attending at the festival is a Cyprus musical company premiered at the Moranbong Theatre.
					 Adamos Katsantonis, head of the musical company, told KCNA:
					
					 I came to the DPRK with humble reverence for President Kim Il Sung. I love the DPRK like my motherland, Cyprus as I had spent many happy days of my life in the DPRK. I am also deeply attached to its nature and culture.
					
					 I am greatly revering the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. And I have longed for the DPRK wherever I go. Every visit to the DPRK makes me feel refreshed.
					
					 The Cyprus Musical Company put on the stage symphonic poem "Legendary Country" which Adamos Katsantonis wrote and composed in praise of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The symphonic poem was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Adamos is on the twelfth visit to the DPRK to attend the April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Cuban Guitarist Wins Popularity at April Art Festival
articles.content:
Cuban Guitarist Wins Popularity at April Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Yalit Gonzalez Gonzalez, a Cuban female guitarist, showed herself at the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival going on here to arouse great admiration from the audience.
					 She successfully performed a Korean song "Ardent Desire" as well as a Cuban song "Guantanamera", a part of Jose Marti's poem on the love for his country and nation.
					
					 After her performance, the guitarist told KCNA that she was satisfied with the festival preparations ensured on a high level. Visiting Pyongyang for the first time, she felt the city was very beautiful and clean and its citizens were very kind, she added.
					
					 What impressed her were the joyful children as well as people in the DPRK enjoying peace and freedom, she said, adding their looks convinced her that peace has settled in the country.
					
					 Yalit Gonzalez Gonzalez has had recitals in various countries and proved successful at domestic festivals. She is now the chief of the Guitar Department of Cuban National Art School and concurrently a teacher of the International Music Department of Cuban University of Arts.

articles.title: Malaysian Harmonica Ensemble Acclaimed at Art Festival
articles.content:
Malaysian Harmonica Ensemble Acclaimed at Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Malaysian My Harmonica World Ensemble is giving its performance at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre as part of the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 The ensemble left a deep impression on the DPRK people at the festival held two years ago.
					
					 At the current festival the ensemble put on the stage such Korean songs chanting the peerlessly great men as "Song of General Kim Il Sung", "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "Footstep".
					
					 Its performers well represented with their harmonica virtuosity the tones of piano, cello, violin, trumpet and other musical instruments to arouse admiration from among the audience.
					
					 What was very impressive is their playing of "General on a Galloping White Horse", a song in praise of leader Kim Jong Il's feats performed in leading the Songun (military-first) cause.
					
					 Chong Ah Kow, head of the ensemble, told KCNA that they prepared those songs to show their reverence for the peerlessly great men and, in particular, the song "Footstep" to tell the rising generations about how wise Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, is.

articles.title: Foreign Marathoners Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Marathoners Leave 
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Marathoners of Namibia, South Africa, Zimbabwe, Ukraine, Spain, Egypt, Ethiopia and Kenya left here Tuesday after taking part in the IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon held on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Earlier leaving here were marathoners of China, Taipei of China, Rwanda, Uzbekistan and Madagascar.

articles.title: Popular China-resident Korean Singer
articles.content:
Popular China-resident Korean Singer
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Choe Kyong Ho, a singer of the art troupe of China-resident Koreans, is one of popular singers well-known among the Korean people.
					 The art troupe is now attending the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival. Choe was acclaimed by the audience for successfully singing songs "My Wife" and "Let Us Become Roots".
					
					 He said that he was deeply moved by the appearance of Pyongyang changing as the days go by and the lively reality of the homeland.
					
					 Though I live in a foreign country, it is my ardent feeling to make even a slightest contribution to the prosperity of the homeland, he said.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Love Knows No Boundary
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Love Knows No Boundary
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime had shown great loving care and benevolence for many foreigners.
					 In the whole period of his life, he established friendship with a large number of foreigners.
					
					 He had met more than 70 000 foreigners of 136 countries, among them 400 party, state and government heads and politicians, media persons, diplomats, religionists, workers, farmers, servicepersons and students.
					
					 Whenever he met them, the President used to tell about friendly relations.
					
					 This shows that he treated foreigners in terms of friendship, not merely aspects of political and diplomatic or business relationship.
					
					 So, he would ask about their health conditions before exchanging conversation about affairs and showed deep care for their convenience.
					
					 Such warm kindness of his, that goes beyond ideology, political view and religion and knows no boundary, turned those from the countries hostile to the DPRK or those who had bad feelings toward it into his supporters and followers.
					
					 The President also rendered international support and sincere assistance to the peoples of countries in the struggle against imperialism and fascism and in the efforts for building a new society.
					
					 That's why many foreigners have deeply revered and ardently followed him, fascinated by his great influence, generosity and personality.
					
					 Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of the world people as the great man and the eternal sun of humankind.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting and book and photo exhibition were held in Italy, a meeting in France and a joint seminar in Romania on April 5 and 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with feats of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing the achievements made by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Present there were figures and other masses of relevant countries.
					
					 An official representative of the Italian branch of the Korean Friendship Association praised Kim Il Sung for founding the immortal Juche idea and Kim Jong Il for leading the Korean revolution to victory with his original Songun politics.
					
					 Guy Dupre, vice-chairman of the France-Korea Friendship Association, said Kim Il Sung was the most distinguished great man recognized by the whole world who made great contributions to accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union who doubles as chairman of the Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, said the Korean people could become the dignified people and the DPRK could throw its rays as a powerful socialist state thanks to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association who doubles as vice-chairman of the Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, noted that the DPRK is dynamically advancing to build an economic power, holding the position of a political, ideological and military power, thanks to the solid foundation laid under the outstanding leadership of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Japan's Suppression of Chongryon Denounced in Germany
articles.content:
Japan's Suppression of Chongryon Denounced in Germany
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party and the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany bitterly denounced the Japanese authorities for suppressing the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on April 3 and 4. 
					 The communist party sent a letter of protest to the Japanese embassy in Berlin. 
					
					 The letter said:
					
					 We resolutely oppose the Japanese authorities' suppression of Chongryon. 
					
					 Chongryon is a dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK protecting the legitimate rights of the Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities' suppression of Chongryon is a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK. 
					
					 Recognizing that the Japanese authorities' moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon are a violation of international law, we demand an immediate stop to the moves. 
					
					 The anti-imperialist forum said in its statement:
					
					 The Korean Hall of Chongryon has played the role for DPRK-Japan friendship and peace in Northeast Asia by performing the duty of a diplomatic mission of the DPRK in the absence of diplomatic ties between the two countries. 
					
					 We bitterly denounce the Japanese authorities' moves to seize the Korean Hall, wanton violation of the dignity and legitimate rights of the Koreans in Japan and human rights abuses. 
					
					 We urge the Japanese authorities to revoke at once the decision to allow the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Communist Party and the Socialist Party of Bangladesh sent a letter in their joint name on April 6 to the Japanese prime minister in protest against the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The letter noted:
					
					 The Korean Hall of Chongryon has been recognized as a center of activities for ensuring the rights and interests of the Koreans in Japan and played the role like a diplomatic mission of the DPRK under the situation in which there are no diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 The Japanese government perpetrated illegal crimes such as holding a trial of auction while forcing the Korean Hall of Chongryon to pay debts caused by the economic bankruptcy in Japan late in the last century.
					
					 This is a wanton violation of the dignity and legitimate rights of Chongryon and a grave infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The Bangladeshi left-wing political parties resolutely reject the decision made by the Tokyo District Court to allow the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon under the manipulation of the Japanese government and strongly urge it to stop at once its moves to seize the Korean Hall.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Britain 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The gist of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Eliminating Dogmatism and Formalism and Establishing Juche in Ideological Work" was carried by the New Communist Party of Britain in the April issue of its bulletin.
					 The work, made public on December 28, Juche 44 (1955), indicates the tasks to eliminate dogmatism and formalism and establish Juche in ideological work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Socialist Party of Romania on its website "Juche Idea" on April 9.
					 The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetimes. It indicates tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Highly Praised Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Highly Praised Kim Jong Il's Exploits
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on April 6 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of the election of leader Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was elected chairman of the NDC of the DPRK in the period when it was in the acute political and military confrontation with the U.S. imperialists who arrogantly acted, styling itself the only superpower in the world after the Soviet Union and eastern European socialist countries collapsed early in the early 1990s.
					
					 He frustrated the imperialists' war moves for aggression with his ever-victorious Songun politics.
					
					 Socialist Korea has turned into an invincible power and global socialist fortress since it upheld him as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 He wisely led the drive for implementing the behests of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Therefore, the two summits were held between the north and the south and the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October declaration were adopted.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a military power with nuclear deterrence thanks to his Songun politics.
					
					 The powerful nuclear deterrence of the DPRK checked and frustrated the U.S. imperialists' moves to ignite a war.
					
					 After his unexpected demise Marshal Kim Jong Un made sure that the DPRK is holding Kim Jong Il as eternal chairman of the NDC of the DPRK in high esteem.
					
					 The exploits of Kim Jong Il will be everlasting.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Beninese Political Figure
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Beninese Political Figure
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, released a statement on April 8 in response to the appeal of the 18th seminar of world political parties on the building of a new society.
					 I extend full support to the appeal adopted at the 18th seminar of world political parties on the building of a new society, he said, and went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung performed immortal exploits on behalf of the era and history, holding high the banner of independence.
					
					 The President, who embarked on the road of the struggle for the country and its people in his early years, founded the Juche idea clarifying that a man is the master of his destiny and is capable of hewing out his destiny.
					
					 He extended sincere support and encouragement to the people of Benin and other African countries in their struggle for national liberation and the building of a new society.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il performed great exploits guaranteeing the eternal foundation and rosy future of socialist Korea.
					
					 The Juche idea, the Songun idea is shining as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 The immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on behalf of the era and history will always be remembered by progressive mankind.
					
					 I and all the members of the Socialist Party of Benin affirm that we will significantly organize political and cultural events on the occasions of the 20th anniversary of the demise of Kim Il Sung and the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Observed by Indian and Nigerian Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Observed by Indian and Nigerian Media
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- An Indian newspaper carried a special write-up and a Nigerian organization posted a special article on its internet website on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) and the 21st anniversary of the election of leader Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The Indian newspaper Science Technology and Education News on April 4 devoted a whole page to articles under the headline tilted "On the occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of the great President Kim Il Sung" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Happy day of President" said that Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the Korean people, took his joy from serving the people all his life. It cited facts to prove it. 
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Eternal chairman of the NDC" on its internet website on April 6.
					
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il is the eternal chairman of the NDC, adding that he established the state machinery centered on the NDC and provided a firm legal guarantee for enforcing Songun politics, thereby laying groundwork for the eternal prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					 The article introduced in detail that Kim Jong Il consolidated the political and ideological base of the country as firm as a rock and ushered in a new era of the building of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised in Peru 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism made public a statement on April 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a great master of ideology and theory and leadership as he embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, fathered the Juche idea and set a theoretical and practical example in all fields of the revolution and construction with his wise leadership. 
					
					 He was an iron-willed brilliant commander and model of the anti-imperialist struggle as he defeated the Japanese and U.S. imperialists in the two revolutionary wars to save the destiny of the country and the nation and provide a sure guarantee for world peace and security.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, successor to the cause of Kim Il Sung, developed in depth the Juche idea, put the national power of the DPRK on the highest level by pursuing invincible Songun politics and firmly protected the destiny of the DPRK and socialism from the imperialist allied forces' anti-DPRK, anti-socialist moves. 
					
					 Korean socialism is now winning victory after victory under the outstanding Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the service personnel and people of the DPRK are working hard to achieve the final victory, united close around him. 
					
					 Progressive political parties and organizations and people in Peru and the rest of the world extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to defend the cause of socialism and the sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del Dia del Sol
 Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 15 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					 Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Kim Tong Hwa y otros funcionarios directivos de  los organos de las fuerzas armadas.
					
					 El Mariscal entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Fueron colocados ante las estatuas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro en nombre del EPC.
					
					 El Mariscal junto con los participantes rindio sublime homenaje a los Generalisimos ante las estatuas de pie.
					
					 En el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Presidente, el Mariscal junto con sus acompanantes le rindio sublime homenaje.
					
					 Paso revista a la sala de conservacion de las ordenes recibidas por el.
					
					 Seguidamente, el Mariscal junto con sus acompanantes entro en el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente y le expreso homenaje postumo.

articles.title: Grupo de inspeccion del CDN revela verdad de la caida de drones
articles.content:
Grupo de inspeccion del CDN revela verdad de la caida de drones
 Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- El grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio a la publicidad el dia 14 los verdaderos aspectos del "incidente de drones", revelados hasta la fecha.
					 Segun el acta de revelacion, las autoridades surcoreanas lo describen como "obra del Norte de Corea" al igual que el incidente de la corbeta "Cheonan".
					
					 Recientemente, fueron descubiertos en varios puntos del suelo surcoreano los drones caidos, comienza el documento y prosigue: 
					
					 Las autoridades militares surcoreanas publicaron el 2 de abril el primer "resultado de investigacion", segun el cual los aviones no tripulados fueron despegados del Norte de Corea. Y el dia 11, presentaron el "resultado de investigacion intermedio" insistiendo en que las fotos, encontradas en los drones, son pruebas mas contundentes que confirman la "obra del Norte de Corea".
					
					 Segun la logica de la parte surcoreana, todas las aeronaves, que circulan entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y llevan las fotografias de la parte Sur, son "las del Norte de Corea". 
					
					 Si fuera asi, se puede sacar la conclusion de que son las surcoreanas las aeronaves que vuelen desde el sur hacia el norte en la parte al norte de la linea de demarcacion militar y tengan las fotos de la parte Norte.
					
					 El "grupo central de investigacion conjunta" presento como una de las pruebas mas evidentes las letras coreanas inscritas en la bateria del motor. 
					
					 Dicen que en la parte frontal de la bateria se ve la marca con inscripciones "Kiyong nalja (fecha de entrada en uso)-25 de junio de 2013" y "Sayongjungji nalja (fecha de salida de uso)-25 de junio de 2014".
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas insisten en que el Norte de Corea usa generalmente esa manera de marcar y en el Sur de Corea se escribe la fecha como "naltza" a diferencia de "nalja" en el Norte de Corea.
					
					 Pero, en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea no se usa nunca la expresion "kiyong" (entrada en uso). En el gran diccionario de lengua coreana no aparece ni el parafraseo de esa expresion. 
					
					 Segun el "resultado de investigacion", en el reverso de la bateria estan las letras chinas y japonesas y el aparato de mantenimiento de la posicion de vuelo de drone es el producto de Futaba de Japon. 
					
					 Entonces, ?como las autoridades surcoreanas sabran explicar esas palabras extranjeras y el aparato de fabricacion japonesa?
					
					 Como un testimonio para certificar el rumor de "obra del Norte" del incidente de drones se presentaron las huellas digitales. 
					
					 ?Quien creeria si insisten en que estas huellas digitales descubiertos en los drones son de los norcoreanos porque no son de los surcoreanos? 
					
					 Al principio, el vocero del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea  aviso que   "no sera facil para certificar el punto de  despegue de drones del Norte aunque se gasten mas de 30 billones como presupuesto para defensa nacional".
					
					 Pero, unos dias despues, el mismo dijo que el lugar de despegue de drones es el aeropuerto de Onchon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					
					 Este aeropuerto no esta situado en dicha provincia sino en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					
					 Poco despues, el mismo vocero dijo que es incorrecto el nombre del lugar publicado antes y el verdadero lugar de despegue de drones es el aeropuerto alrededor de la zona de Ongjin de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					
					 En la RPDC no hay el aeropuerto en la zona cerca de Ongjin.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas dijeron que el otro testimonio es el color verde y blanco del cuerpo de drones.
					
					 En el "resultado de investigacion intermedia" ellas publicaron que en vista de la distancia de  vuelo de drones el presente caso es de la obra del Norte porque su distancia es corta para salir de los paises vecinos y el Sur de Corea no lo hizo.
					
					 Entonces, ?todos los aviones de corta y larga distancia de vuelo son del Norte de Corea?
					
					 El Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea aviso que el radar del avion de mando de las fuerzas aereas "E-8" capturo el 31 de marzo el dron que volaba del Norte hacia la isla Paekryong, lo que confirmo que los drones se despegaron de la zona norte.
					
					 Y justificaron que aunque dispararon de inmediato mas de 300 proyectiles Balkan en tres ocasiones despues de descubrirlos no podian derribarlos porque el maximo alcance de tiro de sus proyectiles es 2km y el dron volaba manteniendo la altura de 5-6km.
					
					 Como si fueran olvidado sus palabras, el "grupo central de investigacion conjunta" publico que el dron descubierto en la isla Paekryong cayo por falta de combustible volando en zigzag con la velocidad 100-120km/h en la altura de 1.4km. 
					
					 Cuando se ampliaron las sospechas de la opinion publica, el grupo respondio vagamente que fue posible acaso que haya aparecido en la isla Paekryong el otro drone desconocido por las autoridades.
					
					 Segun el "resultado de investigacion intermedio", la aeronave fue hecha por la "fundicion en troquel", el circuito electronico pegado a la madera no es el estilo surcoreano y no hay testigos ni declaradores que descubrieron la plataforma de lanzamiento y los equipos adicionales necesarios al despegue de drone. Estas y otras absurdidades son los argumentos de la "obra del Norte de Corea". 
					
					 En cuanto a esa conducta dudosa, la gente susurra que no es facil inventar y comprobar el rumor de que "la caida de drones es obra del Norte de Corea".
					
					 A medida que pase el tiempo, se tornara mas evidente el caracter fraudulento de ese rumor.
					
					 El acta de revelacion denuncia el intento criminal de las autoridades surcoreanas que reprodujeron esta vez el incidente de "Cheonan".
					
					 Primero, al acusar a la RPDC como autora del incidente de drones, las autoridades surcoreanas intentan imputarle la responsabilidad del empeoramiento de las relaciones N-S y de la creacion de la coyuntura a punto de guerra.
					
					 Segundo, con la fabricacion de otro caso de "Cheonan", tratan de repetir las "medidas sobre el Norte del 24 de Mayo" a fin de convertir las relaciones intercoreanas en las siempre conflictivas.
					
					 Tercero, bajo el pretexto del "afianzamiento del estado de seguridad", pretenden involucrar a su amo norteamericano en el aumento armamentista del Sur de Corea, de manera que puedan cubrir el "vacio de las fuerzas militares" y aplastar a toda costa a la RPDC por via militar.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas tienen el vicio de inventar un caso sensacional cada vez que se encuentran en crisis y lanzar, vinculandolo con la RPDC, la febril campana de enfrentamiento con esta.
					
					 Puesto que ellas no retiran todavia el rumor de que el "incidente de ¬¥Cheonan¬¥ es obra del Norte de Corea" y siguen inventando casos similares, el grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC esta dispuesto a verificar todos los hechos.
					
					 Es invariable nuestra posicion de investigar en conjunto todos los incidentes relacionados con la RPDC, inclusive el caso de "Cheonan".
					
					 En representacion de la parte surcoreana, el jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad de Chongwadae, Kim Jang Su, quien presuntamente, se responsabiliza por la seguridad nacional del Sur de Corea, podria tomar parte en la investigacion conjunta que tendra lugar centrando gran atencion de la nacion.
					
					 Si no tienen nada que temer, no habria ninguna razon que haga a las autoridades surcoreanas desoir la justa y racional exigencia de la RPDC que se mantiene desde el principio del estallido del caso de "Cheonan".
					
					 Esperamos la respuesta de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente nicaraguense
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente nicaraguense 
 Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 14 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Republica de Nicaragua, Daniel Ortega Saavedra, con motivo de que ese pais latinoamericano sufrio perdidas humanas y materiales por el terremoto. 
					 El remitente expresa profunda compasion y condolencias al destinatario y por su conducto, al gobierno y pueblo de Nicaragua y a los familiares de los damnificados. 
					
					 Desea que bajo la guia del mandatario, el gobierno nicaraguense elimine cuanto antes las consecuencias del desastre natural y estabilice cuanto antes la vida de los habitantes de la zona damnificada.

Kim Yong Nam se reune con miembros de Consejos de Premios Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam departio este martes en un ambiente amistoso en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con los miembros del Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Il Sung y del Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il quienes le hicieron una visita de cortesia. 
					 Entre ellos figuran Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, dirigente nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico, Johnny Hon, copresidente del Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il, Henry Masiko, director general del Comite Regional Africano para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, y Alexandr Projanov, editor en jefe del periodico ruso Zavtra.

articles.title: Ofrecido banquete por el Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Ofrecido banquete por el Dia del Sol 
 Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Se ofrecio este martes en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el banquete por el 102o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					 Asistieron a la recepcion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales,  los ameritados, las delegaciones de los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y los compatriotas y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					 Fueron invitados los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					 Al hacer uso de la palabra, Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, dijo que la vida del Presidente fue la revolucionaria de destacado lider y veterano politico sin igual quien con profundas teorias e ideologias, destacada capacidad directiva y grandes practicas revolucionarias, realizo imborrables proezas ante la patria, el pueblo, la epoca y la revolucion. 
					
					 Reflejando la unanime alma de los oficiales y soldados y habitantes coreanos y los pueblos progresistas del mundo, rindio el mas sublime homenaje y eterna gloria a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Insistio en la necesidad de continuar y desarrollar la idea, la causa y las imperecederas hazanas de los Generalisimos guardando en lo profundo del corazon sus imagenes del Sol y cumplir el deber de descendientes del Presidente y soldados y discipulos del Dirigente. 
					
					 Apunto que se debe establecer estrictamente el sistema de direccion unica del partido en todos los dominios de la revolucion y la construccion y continuar hasta el final la marcha iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu mediante la unidad monolitica de todos los militares y civiles en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Llamo a impulsar con dinamismo la causa nacional de reunificacion de la patria, en acato a los legados de los Generalisimos, y subrayo la posicion de la RPDC de hacer ingentes esfuerzos por la paz y seguridad del mundo y la prosperidad comun de la humanidad.
